displayName.brazilian: Se você me mostrar sua coragem
displayName.english: If You Show Me Your Courage

description.french: Tu as obtenu tous les succès !

displayName.brazilian: Este é só o início do mundo
displayName.spanish: Solo es el principio del mundo

description.french: Tu as terminé le prologue !
Tu as terminé la saga Saiyenne !

description.brazilian: Completou a Saga Retorno dos Saiyajins!
description.english: Cleared the Return of the Saiyans Saga!
description.french: Tu as terminé la saga du retour des Saiyens !
description.italian: Saga del ritorno dei Saiyan completata!
description.spanish: ¡Has terminado la saga Retorno de los Saiyans!

description.brazilian: Completou a Saga das Forças Ginyu!
description.french: Tu as terminé la saga du Commando Ginyu !
Tu as terminé la saga de Freezer !
Tu as terminé la saga de Cell !
Tu as terminé la saga des Cyborgs !

description.brazilian: Completou a Saga do Majin Boo!
description.french: Tu as terminé la saga de Buu !

description.brazilian: Comp. Saga Bills, o Deus da Destruição!
description.english: Cleared the God of Destruction Beerus Saga!
description.french: Tu as terminé la saga de Beerus, le dieu de la destruction !
description.italian: Saga del Dio della distruzione Bills completata!
description.spanish: ¡Has terminado la saga Bills, Dios de la Destrucción!

displayName.russian: Чем сильнее враг, тем сильнее герой!

description.brazilian: Comp. Saga de Demigra, o Deus Demoníaco!
description.english: Cleared the Demon God Demigra Saga!
description.french: Tu as terminé la saga du dieu démon Demigra !
description.italian: Saga del Dio demoniaco Demigra completata!
description.spanish: ¡Has terminado la saga Dios demonio Demigra!

displayName.italian: Quando il gioco si fa duro...
displayName.polish: O mały włos, a jakie emocje!

description.brazilian: Comp. a Saga do Lendário Super Saiyajin!
description.english: Cleared the Legendary Super Saiyan Saga!
description.french: Tu as terminé la saga du Super Saiyen légendaire !
description.italian: Saga del Super Saiyan leggendario completata!
description.spanish: ¡Has terminado la saga Súper Saiyan legendario!

description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Son Goku !
description.spanish: ¡Has completado el entrenamiento con Son Goku!

description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Piccolo !
Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Krilin !
Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Vegeta !

description.brazilian: Completou treinamento com Gohan e Videl!
description.english: Completed training with Gohan and Videl!
description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Son Gohan et Videl !
description.german: Training mit Son-Gohan und Videl abgeschlossen!
description.italian: Hai completato l'allenamento con Gohan e Videl!
description.polish: Ukończono szkolenie z Son Gohanem i Videl!
description.russian: Вы завершили тренировку с Гоханом и Видел!
description.spanish: ¡Has completado el entrenamiento con Son Gohan y Videl!

description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Ginyu !
Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Freezer !
Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec C-18 !
Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Cell !

description.brazilian: Treinamento com o Mr. Satan completo!
description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec M. Satan !
description.italian: Hai completato l'allenamento con Mr. Satan!
description.spanish: ¡Has completado el entrenamiento con Mr. Satan!

description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Gotenks !

description.brazilian: Completou o treinamento com o Bills!
description.french: Tu as terminé l'entraînement avec Beerus !

description.brazilian: Obteve sua primeira Esfera do Dragão!
description.french: Tu as obtenu ta 1re boule de cristal !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto la tua prima Sfera del Drago!

description.brazilian: Encontrou a Esfera de Duas Estrelas!
description.french: Tu as obtenu la 2e boule de cristal !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto la Sfera del Drago 2 stelle!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado la Bola Dragón de 2 estrellas!

description.brazilian: Encontrou a Esfera de Quatro Estrelas!
description.french: Tu as obtenu la 4e boule de cristal !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto la Sfera del Drago 4 stelle!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado la Bola Dragón de 4 estrellas!

displayName.english: The Best Miracle Of The World

description.english: Gathered 7 Dragon Balls and summoned Shenron!
description.french: Tu as réuni les 7 boules de cristal et invoqué Shenron !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto le 7 Sfere del Drago ed evocato Shenron!
description.polish: Zebrano 7 Smoczych Kul i przywołano Shenrona!
description.russian: Вы собрали 7 драконьих жемчужин и призвали Шенрона!
description.spanish: ¡Has reunido 7 Bolas Dragón y has invocado a Shenron!

description.french: Tu as déverrouillé tous les personnages et toutes les variations !
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i personaggi e le varianti!
description.polish: Odblokowano wszystkie postacie i ich wersje!
description.spanish: ¡Has desbloqueado todos los personajes y sus variantes!

displayName.spanish: A la ciudad que no figura

description.french: Tu as visité tous les niveaux !
description.italian: Hai combattuto in tutti i livelli!

displayName.english: For The Sake Of The Future

description.brazilian: Jogou Batalhas Online pela primeira vez!
description.english: Played Online Battles for the first time!
description.french: Tu as joué pour la 1re fois un combat en ligne !
description.italian: Hai giocato una Battaglia online per la prima volta!
description.polish: Rozegrano Walkę sieciową po raz pierwszy!
description.russian: Вы первый раз сыграли сетевую игру!
description.spanish: ¡Has jugado un combate en línea por primera vez!

description.french: Tu as joué 7 fois un combat en ligne !

displayName.english: A Fight Of Courage And Pride
displayName.german: Kampf mit Liebe, Mut und Stolz
displayName.polish: Walczę z miłością, odwagą i dumą
displayName.spanish: Lucharé con amor, valor y honra

description.french: Tu as gagné 7 fois un combat en ligne !

description.brazilian: Adicionou Pat. do Tempo aos Favoritos!
description.english: Added a Time Patroller to your Favorites List!
description.french: Tu as ajouté un policier du temps dans les favoris !
description.italian: Hai aggiunto un pattugliatore ai Preferiti!
description.polish: Dodano członka Patrolu Czasu do ulubionych!
description.russian: Вы добавили патрульного в список избранных!
description.spanish: ¡Has añadido a un Patrullero del Tiempo a "Favoritos"!

displayName.brazilian: Me dê um pouco dessa energia!
displayName.polish: Podziel się ze mną swą energią!

description.french: Tu as offert un cadeau !

displayName.english: I Got A Present For Ya!

description.french: Tu as reçu un cadeau !

displayName.brazilian: É o início de uma jornada!

description.french: Tu as terminé une quête parallèle !
Tu as terminé 7 quêtes parallèles !

description.russian: Параллельные задания выполнены больше чем на 50%!
description.spanish: ¡Has completado más del 50% de las misiones secundarias!

description.brazilian: Proporção de MP completas acima de 80%!
description.english: Parallel Quest completion rate is over 80%!
description.french: Tu as terminé 80 % des quêtes parallèles !

description.russian: Параллельные задания выполнены больше чем на 80%!
description.spanish: ¡Has completado más del 80% de las misiones secundarias!

description.french: Tu as terminé toutes les quêtes parallèles !
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le missioni parallele!

description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli Attacchi Supremi!

description.french: Tu as réuni toutes les attaques spéciales !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli Attacchi Speciali!

Tu as assisté à 7 combats !
Tu as réuni 500 000 zénis !

description.brazilian: Participou de Batalha Sem Fim 7 vezes!
description.french: Tu as participé à 7 combats infinis !
description.italian: Hai giocato 7 volte in modalità Partita infinita!
description.polish: Wzięto udział w 7 Walkach bez końca!

description.french: Tu as gagné 7 combats infinis !
description.italian: Hai vinto 7 volte in modalità Partita infinita!

displayName.spanish: Semillas de amor por los cielos

description.english: Revived KO'd allies 7 times in online matches!
description.french: Tu as réanimé 7 fois un allié KO pendant un combat en ligne !
description.italian: Hai rianimato 7 volte un alleato KO giocando online!
description.polish: Wskrzeszono znokautowanych sojuszników 7 razy w Walkach sieciowych!
description.russian: Вы оживили союзника 7 раз в боях по сети!
description.spanish: ¡Has revivido a aliados KO 7 veces en combates en línea!

description.brazilian: Níveis de amizade máx. com todos mestres
description.english: Friendship levels maximized with all masters!
description.french: Tu as atteint le niveau maximal d'amitié avec tous les maîtres !
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il livello massimo di amicizia con tutti i maestri!
description.polish: Osiągnięto maksymalny poziom przyjaźni ze wszystkimi mistrzami!
description.russian: Достигнут максимальный уровень дружбы со всеми учителями!
description.spanish: ¡Niveles de amistad maximizados con todos los maestros!
